pkgmetadata.longdescription: Recurrence Quantification Analysis for Categorical and Continuous Time-Series // Auto, Cross and Multi-dimensional recurrence quantification analysis. Different methods for computing recurrence, cross vs. multidimensional or profile iti.e., only looking at the diagonal recurrent points, as well as functions for optimization and plotting are proposed. in-depth measures of the whole cross-recurrence plot, Please refer to by Coco and Dale (2014) doi:10.3389/fpsyg.2014.00510 and Wallot (2018) doi:10.1080/00273171.2018.1512846 for further details about the method.
